titlestmt.titleproper: Rockefeller Family papers, Home Movies and Newsreels
A Guide to the Rockefeller Family papers, Home Movies and Newsreels FA1303

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-03-15 01:04:56 -0400.

did.unittitle: Rockefeller Family papers, Home Movies and Newsreels

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Open for research with select materials restricted as noted. When requesting to view audiovisual material, please refer to the Title and the AV Number (example: AV 1916). Researchers are asked to check the "Restrictions" note for each Title. If a Title does not currently have an access copy, please contact a RAC archivist for further instruction.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Contains 113 films created by Rockefeller family members and 56 newsreels featuring the Rockefellers.

did.unittitle: John D. Rockefeller Sr. Family Home Movies

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: John D. Rockefeller Sr. home movies between 1924-1929. Types of records include: films

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: When requesting to view audiovisual material, please refer to the Title and the AV Number (example: AV 1916). Researchers are asked to check the "Restrictions" note for each Title. If a Title does not currently have an access copy, please contact a RAC archivist for further instruction.

did.unittitle: John D. Rockefeller Sr. Hosting at The Casements

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Ormond Beach, FL. John D. Rockefeller Sr. hosting at The Casements: Guests exit house; John D. Rockefeller Sr. exits house; addresses camera; greets guests on lawn. Greetings are repeated three times.

did.unittitle: John D. Rockefeller Sr. Playing Golf

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Ormond Beach, FL. John D Rockefeller golfing: Group golfs wide; John D. Rockefeller Sr. putts; hands caddies dimes; pan course; John D. Rockefeller Sr. shakes hands; group gets in cars, drive off.

did.unittitle: John D. Rockefeller Sr. at The Casements

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Ormond Beach, FL. John D. Rockefeller Sr. hosting at The Casements: Three different occasions - John D. Rockefeller Sr. greets guests by tree; John D. Rockefeller Sr. and guests exit and get in car. (Action repeated twice.)

did.unittitle: John D. Rockefeller Sr.'s 85th Birthday

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. John D. Rockefeller Sr.'s 85th birthday: John D. Rockefeller Sr. and guests putt golf balls on lawn; sit on terrace; walk through Kykuit gardens; man sets up radio.

did.unittitle: John D. Rockefeller Sr. at Orange Grove

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Ormond Beach, FL. John D. Rockefeller Sr. at Orange Grove: John D. Rockefeller Sr. walks in, picks orange; tastes orange with man; given sapling by a younger man.

did.unittitle: John D. Rockefeller Sr.'s 86th Birthday

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. John D. Rockefeller Sr.'s 86th Birthday: John D. Rockefeller Sr. and guests sit by terrace; putt on lawn; John D. Rockefeller Sr. sits; addresses camera standing.

did.unittitle: John D. Rockefeller Sr. Visits His Childhood Homes

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: New York State. John D. Rockefeller Sr. and daughters travel to his childhood homes in Richford, Owego, and Moravia; cemetery; parade; airshow; Bear Mountain Bridge; return to Kykuit.

did.unittitle: John D. Rockefeller Sr. Golfing on the Lakewood Estate

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Lakewood, NJ. John D. Rockefeller Sr. golfing on the Lakewood Estate: Shot of house; John D. Rockefeller Sr. walks with caddy; various wide and medium shots of golfing.

did.unittitle: John D. Rockefeller Sr. and Others Visit Pelican Island

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Sebastian, FL. John D. Rockefeller Sr., Abby Aldrich Rockefeller, David Rockefeller and others visit Pelican Island: Group boards boats; trip to island; close-ups of pelicans; wide shots of island.

did.unittitle: Young Woman with Dog in Pocantico Hills, New York

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. Young woman with dog in farm-like setting.

did.unittitle: John D. Rockefeller Sr. Hosting Will Rogers at The Casements

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Ormond Beach, FL. John D. Rockefeller Sr. hosting Will Rogers at The Casements: John D. Rockefeller Sr. and Will Rogers exit house; golf with a small group.

did.unittitle: Rockefellers in Ormond Beach

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Ormond Beach, FL: John D. Rockefeller Sr. at Ormond Union Church; views of Ormond Beach Hotel. John D. Rockefeller Sr.: with boy scouts, with a group at country club, golfing, and on mule cart. A costumed chariot race; John D. Rockefeller Jr. on horseback.
At Casements: John D. Rockefeller Sr. on cart; butler; yard workers; dogs; David Rockefeller on bike; John D. Rockefeller Sr. passing dimes in park; Ormond Garage race car; beach and landscape shots

did.unittitle: John D. Rockefeller Sr. in St Augustine

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: St. Augustine, FL: John D. Rockefeller Sr. in St Augustine on various occasions: alone and with Abby Aldrich Rockefeller and group; Old mill; group outside hotel, watch parade and band.

John D. Rockefeller Sr. alone at Castillo de San Marcos; Henry Flagler Memorial; giving dimes to men. View of swamp; Bridge of Lions; group at Castillo; John D. Rockefeller Sr. at Henry M. Flagler statue; shots of burning sugar cane fields.

did.unittitle: John D. Rockefeller Sr. Visited by Osers

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Lakewood, NJ. John D. Rockefeller Sr. is visted by granddaughter Mathilde McCormick Oser, Max Oser and children Anita and Peter outside of Golf House.

did.unittitle: John D. Rockefeller Sr. Golfing with Small Group

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Lakewood, NJ. John D. Rockefeller Sr. golfing with small group; sheep graze on lawn of Golf House; golfing party; unknown house; blimp in sky.

did.unittitle: Alta Prentice at her Mount Hope Farm

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Williamstown, MA. John D. Rockefeller Sr.'s daughter Alta Prentice at her Mount Hope Farm. John D. Rockefeller Sr. at chicken coop in different location - possibly Pocantico or Lakewood.

did.unittitle: Compilation of Shots from Pocantico Hills, New York.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. Miscellaneous compilation: John D. Rockefeller Sr. walks by wooded construction site. At Kykuit: women in garden; horse drawn wagons; parked cars.

did.unittitle: New Croton Dam in Croton-on-Hudson, New York

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Views of New Croton Dam in Croton-on-Hudson, NY. (No images of Rockefeller family members.)

did.unittitle: John D. Rockefeller Sr. at the Casements

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Ormond Beach, FL: John D. Rockefeller Sr. at the Casements. He exits house and walks to camera; sits by Halifax River; on ornamental bridge; feeds bird; enters house.

did.unittitle: John D. Rockefeller Sr. at Ormond Beach Train Station

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Ormond Beach, FL: John D. Rockefeller Sr. gives dimes to children; exits car; with crowds on platform; listens to band; boards train.

did.unittitle: Tea at the Casements

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Ormond Beach, FL: John D. Rockefeller Sr. hosting John D. Rockefeller, Abby Aldrich Rockefeller, and others for tea at The Casements. Guests arrive; servants; tea on terrace; reception line; pose on lawn.

did.unittitle: John D. Rockefeller Jr. Family Home Movies

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: John D. Rockefeller Jr. home movies between 1917-1946. Types of records include: films.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: When requesting to view audiovisual material, please refer to the Title and the AV Number (example: AV 1916). Researchers are asked to check the "Restrictions" note for each Title. If a Title does not currently have an access copy, please contact a RAC archivist for further instruction.

did.unittitle: Rockefeller Children at 10 West 54th Street – Filmed by Koshiba

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: New York, NY. Rockefeller Children at 10 West 54th Street – filmed by Koshiba: Laurance Rockefeller, Winthrop Rockefeller with book; Nelson Rockefeller, David Rockefeller, Winthrop Rockefeller, Laurance Rockefeller, Abby "Babs" Rockefeller, John D. Rockefeller 3rd with toys and book; Laurance Rockefeller, Winthrop Rockefeller ride toy hand cars in solarium, Laurance Rockefeller fixes wheel.

did.unittitle: David Rockefeller at 10 West 54th Street – Filmed by Koshiba

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: New York, NY. David Rockefeller at 10 West 54th Street – filmed by Koshiba: David Rockefeller with flowers, hobby horse, blocks, and book.

did.unittitle: School Pageant at The Lincoln School

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: New York, NY. School pageant at The Lincoln School - 646 Park Avenue; Children shop, buy ticket, form train, farm, milk cow and garden.

did.unittitle: Science Demonstration at The Lincoln School

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: New York, NY. Science demonstration at The Lincoln School - 646 Park Avenue: Man blows glass, works gas-discharge lamp apparatus.

did.unittitle: Rockefeller Family at Pocantico - Part I

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. Rockefeller Family at Pocantico - Part I: John D. Rockefeller 3rd, Nelson Rockefeller, Laurance Rockefeller, Winthrop Rockefeller and David Rockefeller enter with bunnies, joined by Abby Aldrich Rockefeller; single medium shots of John D. Rockefeller 3rd, Nelson Rockefeller, Laurance Rockefeller, and Winthrop Rockefeller.

did.unittitle: Rockefeller Family at Pocantico - Part II

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. Rockefeller Family at Pocantico - Part II: John D. Rockefeller 3rd, Nelson Rockefeller, Laurance Rockefeller, Winthrop Rockefeller and David Rockefeller leave Abeyton Lodge riding bicycles; David Rockefeller rides tricycle, plays with dog, David Rockefeller close-ups on trike near Abeyton.

did.unittitle: Rockefeller Family at Pocantico - Part III

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. Rockefeller Family at Pocantico - Part III: Abby Aldrich Rockefeller, Abby "Babs" Rockefeller, and five brothers say goodbyes to John D. Rockefeller Jr. in front of Abeyton Lodge; John D. Rockefeller Jr. drives off in a carriage; Abby Aldrich Rockefeller and David Rockefeller watch Abby "Babs" Rockefeller drive off from Abeyton in a car – with unedited takes

did.unittitle: Rockefeller Family at Pocantico - Part IV

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. Rockefeller Family at Pocantico - Part IV: Nelson Rockefeller, Laurance Rockefeller, Winthrop Rockefeller, and David Rockefeller ride horses on the grounds with Joe Plick.

did.unittitle: Rockefeller Family at Pocantico - Part V

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. Rockefeller Family at Pocantico - Part V: John D. Rockefeller Sr. and John D. Rockefeller 3rd golf on the grounds; pan of Kykuit from below.

did.unittitle: Rockefeller Family Trip to France

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Atlantic crossings, various France locations. Family Trip to France: on ship – Nelson Rockefeller, David Rockefeller, and John D. Rockefeller 3rd play games; French villages; David Rockefeller, Winthrop Rockefeller row boat; with goats; David Rockefeller catches bugs at Fontainebleau; Versailles; return voyage – Nelson Rockefeller with girl, Nelson Rockefeller, Laurance Rockefeller play games; views of NYC harbor and skyline.

did.unittitle: Reims Cathedral

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Reims, France. Reims Cathedral undergoing restoration; Views from tower and roof of work in progress on Cathedral.

did.unittitle: Young Men Hiking in Yosemite

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Western US. Three unidentified young men hiking in Yosemite; shots of waterfall; unidentified younger children play in stream.

did.unittitle: Teenage Group Playing in Maine

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Maine. Unidentified teenage group pillow fight on lawn, ride tree swing, wrestle, toss ball; group swims in lake, uses canoe and motorboat.

did.unittitle: Christmas Morning at The Casements

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Ormond Beach, FL. Christmas morning at The Casements: John D. Rockefeller Jr., Abby Aldrich Rockefeller, David Milton, Abby (Babs) Rockefeller, Nelson Rockefeller, Winthrop Rockefeller, and John D. Rockefeller 3rd open Christmas gifts.

did.unittitle: Rockefeller Family at Playhouse on Easter Sunday

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. Family at Playhouse on Easter Sunday (filmed with three different cameras): John D. Rockefeller Sr., John D. Rockefeller Jr., Abby Aldrich Rockefeller, Abby (Babs) Rockefeller, John D. Rockefeller 3rd, Nelson A. Rockefeller, Mary Clark Rockefeller, Laurance Rockefeller, Winthrop Rockefeller, David Rockefeller, and others at Union Church; arrive at Playhouse, play croquet, sit on terrace, leave Playhouse; arrive at Abeyton Lodge.

did.unittitle: Winthrop Rockefeller and Friends

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. Teenage Winthrop Rockefeller and group of friends drive around Kykuit and Abeyton Lodge in Model T; clown around at wishing well.

did.unittitle: Nelson A. Rockefeller, Mary Clark Rockefeller, Winthrop Rockefeller, and Friends in Pocantico Hills

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. Nelson A. Rockefeller, Mary T. Rockefeller, Winthrop Rockefeller, and a group of friends drive Model T; arrive at Abeyton Lodge; drive to Playhouse; swim in indoor pool.

did.unittitle: Family at Pocantico Hills

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. Family scenes: Nelson A. Rockefeller and Mary Clark Rockefeller say goodbye to Abby Aldrich Rockefeller and Winthrop Rockefeller on porch of Abeyton Lodge; drive off in Mercury convertible to Playhouse.

did.unittitle: Princeton, Yale, and Cornell Track Meet at Palmer Stadium

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Princeton, New Jersey. Princeton, Yale, and Cornell track meet at Palmer Stadium: Shots of various track and field events, some in slow motion. (Filmed by Winthrop Rockefeller, who attended Yale 1931 to 1934.)

did.unittitle: Scenes of John D. Rockefeller Jr. and Abby Aldrich Rockefeller at Bassett Hall

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Williamsburg, VA. Scenes at Bassett Hall: John D. Rockefeller Jr. and Abby Aldrich Rockefeller have tea in garden; Abby knits scarf for war effort; Mr. Rckefeller reviews blueprints with Kenneth Chorley and William Perry.

did.unittitle: The Eyrie Garden

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Seal Harbor, ME. The Eyrie Garden: Abby Aldrich Rockefeller, John D. Rockefeller Jr., and Winthrop Rockefeller (in uniform) walk through garden, sit on benches.

did.unittitle: Abby (Babs) Rockefeller Family Home Movies

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Abby (Babs) Rockefeller home movies between 1928 and 1934. Types of records include: films.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: When requesting to view audiovisual material, please refer to the Title and the AV Number (example: AV 1916). Researchers are asked to check the "Restrictions" note for each Title. If a Title does not currently have an access copy, please contact a RAC archivist for further instruction.

did.unittitle: Abby (Babs) Rockefeller with Newborn Mitzi (Abby)

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. Abby (Babs) Rockefeller with newborn Mitzi (Abby): In crib; giving bottle; on bed.

did.unittitle: Rockefeller Family Poses for Koshiba Portraits with Baby Mitzi (Abby)

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. Family poses for Koshiba portraits with baby Mitzi (Abby): John D. Rockefeller Sr., John D. Rockefeller Jr., Abby Aldrich Rockefeller, Winthrop Rockefeller, Abby (Babs) Rockefeller, David Milton, and Abby (Mitzi) Milton.

did.unittitle: At One Beekman Place

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: New York, NY. Abby (Babs) Rockefeller, David Milton, and baby Mitzi (Abby) at One Beekman Place: Mitzi in playpen; crib; highchair; fed by Babs.

did.unittitle: At the Home of David Hunter McAlpin III

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Princeton, NJ. Abby (Babs) Rockefeller, David Milton - at the home of David Hunter McAlpin III: with McAlpin family on terrace; in car; playing with kids on lawn.

did.unittitle: At the Home of Ellen Hunt Milton

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Oyster Bay, NY. Abby (Babs) Rockefeller, David Milton - at the home of Mrs. Ellen Hunt Milton: with Wallace and Ellen Milton Harrison by house; swimming in lake.

did.unittitle: At the Home of George and Margaret Strong de Cuevas

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Westbury, NY. Abby (Babs) Rockefeller at the home of George and Margaret Strong de Cuevas: Babs Rockefeller, Margaret Strong de Cuevas, and her daughter Bessie in sun room.

did.unittitle: John D. Rockefeller Sr. and Mitzi (Abby) on Golf Course

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Tarrytown, NY. John D. Rockefeller Sr. and great-granddaughter Mitzi (Abby Milton) on golf course: John D. Rockefeller Sr. golfs with group; Mitzi plays with club; car arrives for Senior.

did.unittitle: David Rockefeller and Mitzi (Abby) at Kykuit

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. David Rockefeller and Mitzi (Abby Milton) at Kykuit: play at sheep barn; Japanese lake; Mitzi rides pony Rastus with Joe Plick.

did.unittitle: Mitzi (Abby) at Kykuit

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. Mitzi (Abby Milton) at Kykuit: swims in fountain; plays on lawn; people (staff?) exit frame house.

did.unittitle: John D. Rockefeller Sr. and Mitzi (Abby) at Kykuit

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. John D. Rockefeller Sr. and Mitzi (Abby Milton) at Kykuit: exchange flower; sit on bench; golf; view from Kykuit; Mitzi in pram; plays with doll; on lawn.

did.unittitle: Mitzi (Abby) and Scenes From One Beekman Place

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Manhattan home at One Beekman Place: Mitzi (Abby Milton) on terrace, plays with doll; carriage; pail and shovel; statue; views of East River; building dock; neighborhood of Manhattan's East 40s.

did.unittitle: Mitzi (Abby) Picking Berries and with Baby Marilyn

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Seal Harbor, ME. Mitzi (Abby Milton) picking berries; Mitzi and Babs with baby Marilyn (7 weeks old).

did.unittitle: Abby (Babs) Rockefeller, David Milton, and Mitzi in Seal Harbor

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Seal Harbor, ME. David Milton, Mitzi (Abby) on dock; sailing; Babs, David, and Mitzi Milton picnic on rocks.

did.unittitle: At Abeyton Lodge

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. Abby (Babs) Rockefeller, Mitzi (Abby), baby Marilyn (3 months old) on Abeyton Lodge porch; John D. Rockefeller Jr., Abby Aldrich Rockefeller, and Mitzi depart Abeyton in pony cart.

did.unittitle: Family at Playhouse and Driving Cars

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. John D. Rockefeller Jr., Abby Aldrich Rockefeller, Abby (Babs) Rockefeller, David Milton, John D. Rockefeller 3rd, Nelson Rockefeller, Mary Clark Rockefeller, Laurance Rockefeller, Winthrop Rockefeller, David Rockefeller, and Mitzi (Abby Milton) at Playhouse. Mitzi and Abby Aldrich Rockefeller arrive; family drives cars around circle, parking lot.

did.unittitle: Family at Playhouse and Abeyton Lodge

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. John D. Rockefeller Jr., Abby Aldrich Rockefeller, Abby (Babs) Rockefeller, David Milton, John D. Rockefeller 3rd, Nelson Rockefeller, Mary Clark Rockefeller, Laurance Rockefeller, Winthrop Rockefeller, David Rockefeller, and Mitzi (Abby Milton) at Playhouse and Abeyton Lodge; croquet; on porch; on bikes; by wishing well.

did.unittitle: Summer in Seal Harbor I

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Seal Harbor, ME. David Milton, Mitzi (Abby Milton) sailing; David Milton, Mitzi, and Marilyn with Abby Aldrich Rockefeller on boat; Abby Aldrich Rockefeller, David Rockefeller, David Milton, Mitzi, and Marilyn picnic on Sutton Island.

did.unittitle: Summer in Seal Harbor II

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Seal Harbor, ME. Abby (Babs) Rockefeller, David Milton, Mitzi (Abby) fishing from sail boat; Mitzi amd Marilyn at Seal Harbor Club kiddie pool; Babs Rockefeller on Wabenaki home balcony.

did.unittitle: Family Playing on Ormond Beach

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Ormond Beach, FL. Nelson Rockefeller, Laurance Rockefeller, David Rockefeller, David Milton dig in sand; David Rockefeller, Babs, David Milton, Nelson Rockefeller in ocean; Nelson Rockefeller, Mary Clark Rockefeller, Babs, David Milton, and lifeguard bury David Rockefeller in the sand.

did.unittitle: Mitzi, Marilyn, and Scenes From One Beekman Place

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: New York, NY. One Beekman Place: Mitzi (Abby) and Marilyn on terrace; tumble; play with watering can and statue; East River views; at building's playground.

did.unittitle: Mitzi and Marilyn

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: New York, NY. One Beekman Place: Mitzi (Abby) does acrobatics in apartment; Mitzi and Marilyn sit on terrace bench.

did.unittitle: Milton Home - Pocantico Hills, NY

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. Milton Home: David Milton, Mitzi (Abby), and Marilyn on go-kart; girls feed chickens; feed dogs and cats; play on lawn.

did.unittitle: Mitzi and Marilyn Dancing

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: New York, NY. One Beekman Place: in apartment Mitzi (Abby) tap dances; does acrobatics; East River and Welfare Island views; Mitzi and Marilyn sit by terrace statue.

did.unittitle: Milton Family Outside in Pocantico Hills, New York - I

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. Milton Home: Mitzi (Abby) and Marilyn feed chickens; Mitzi at bee hive; girls play on haystack; David Milton, Mitzi on lake raft; Marilyn on sand.

did.unittitle: Milton Family Outside in Pocantico Hills, New York - II

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. Milton Home: Mitzi (Abby) and Marilyn wade in pool; girls play with dog; Abby (Babs) Rockefeller, David Milton, Mitzi, and Marilyn fish off footbridge; play with cats.

did.unittitle: "Looney Tunes by Babs"

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Various locations. "Looney Tunes by Babs" - Milton Family film compilation. Edited by Abby (Babs) Rockefeller Mauze and Abby (Mitzi) O'Neill, c. 1960.

did.unittitle: Head and Tail cards for "Looney Tunes by Babs"

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Head and Tail cards for the "Looney Tunes by Babs" compilation. B and O Film Effects.

did.unittitle: Laurance S. Rockefeller Family Home Movies

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Laurance S. Rockefeller home movies circa 1935-1955. Types of records include: films.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. Mary French Rockefeller walks around site of house under construction; plays with dog.

did.unittitle: Mary French Rockefeller with Newborn Laura in Hospital

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: New York, NY. Mary French Rockefeller with newborn Laura in hospital. Laura in crib; with nurse; with Mary French Rockefeller in bed; in crib

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: New York, NY. Baby Laura in highchair being fed by her nanny Mrs. Plate.

did.unittitle: Mary French Rockefeller with Laura on lawn at Kykuit

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. Mary French Rockefeller with toddler Laura in playpen; on lawn at Kykuit.

did.unittitle: Mary French Rockefeller and Laura in Central Park - I

scopecontent.p: New York, NY. Mary French Rockefeller and Laura in Central Park: In carriage; walking with pull toy; on bench with Mary French Rockefeller and doll.

did.unittitle: Mary French Rockefeller and Laura in Central Park - II

phystech.head: Physical Characteristics and Technical Requirements
phystech.p: Color drops out momentarily due to repair using black and white footage.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: New York, NY. Mary French Rockefeller and Laura in Central Park: Leaving 115 E. 67th St. apartment building; in carriage; walking; sitting on lawn.

did.unittitle: Laura Rockefeller Playing

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: When requesting to view audiovisual material, please refer to the Title and the AV Number (example: AV 1916). Researchers are asked to check the "Restrictions" note for each Title. If a Title does not currently have an access copy, please contact a RAC archivist for further instruction.

did.unittitle: This Is America — Rockefeller Center

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: RKO Radio Pictures. Rockefeller Center: This Is America, July 28 1944. (II, 10)

This film provides a detailed guided tour through the recently-completed complex. From the outside to the inside, from street-level to observation deck, from machines far below the street to a cocktail bar in the top floor, the cameras move through the buildings. Viewers are made acquainted with the high-speed elevators, with the crowds of tourists and guided tours, with the rooftop gardens, and with such technical services as the restaurants, air conditioning plants, window and floor cleaning operations, locksmith shops, and the post office.

A comparatively long sequence introduces the Radio City Music Hall: on view are the dancing Rockettes at leisure, at practice on the roof, and on the stage of the Music Hall. Special attention is given to the backstage activities, including scene design, choreography, rehearsal, and technical aspects of production. Similarly, on a tour of the NBC radio broadcasting facilities, viewers are taken "backstage" to see the technicians, actors, sound effects men, announcers, orchestras, and control rooms. In the experimental television studios, the relatively unfamiliar invention is introduced as "radio with eyes."

did.unittitle: Jackie at Opening of 1st Unit of N.Y.C. Cultural Center

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Movietone News. Opening of Philharmonic Hall in New York City, September 23, 1962. Jacqueline Kennedy is accompanied by John D. Rockefeller 3rd. Also in attendance: Nelson A. Rockefeller; New York City Mayor Robert F. Wagner; U Thant, United Nations Acting Secretary General; Adlai Stevenson, U.S. Ambassador to the United Nations, Senator Jacob Javits; and Dean Rusk, U.S. Secretary of State.
